title: Public Image Ltd. - Complete Albums (SHM-CD Japan 2015) [FLAC]
description:
Universal Music Japan released a career spanning collection of Public Image Ltd.: All 10 studio albums, two live albums, one greatest hit compilation and John Lydon's solo album Psycho's Path. 


Public Image Limited - Albums Collection
Label: Universal Music Japan
Format: 14 x CD, Albums, Compilation, Reissue, Remastered, Mini-LP (Cardboard Sleeve), 5 x PT-SHM-CD, 9 x SHM-CD
Country: Japan
Released: 2015
Genre: Rock
